description: Trail starts in a conservation area and is north Sheffield lake. Trail follows a granite ridge comes back out to hwy#41 about 1/2k north of the turn to the parking area.Several good rocky lookouts. Unusual rock formations and rare trees and plants in the area. Bugs can be bad in spring and summer.There is also a dark sky viewing area so if you can plan your trip to takeadvantage of the awesome nigh-time display of a star-filled sky.
directions: On west side of highway #41 seven miles south of Kaladar. Well marked Sheffield conservation area sign.
title: Sheffield lake north loop
